data.prayer: Over 99.57 percent of the people of Bogra are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Bogra.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, help 680 new simple churches start among the 3,400,900 people in the county of Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Tirendaj people. Make the Tirendaj people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Bogra. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.section_summary:
the county of Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh has a population of 3,400,900.

We estimate Bogra has 4,260 people who might know Jesus, 10,203 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,386,437 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bogra, Rajshahi, Bangladesh a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
